name: Huiguang Chu
body:
### Who am I.
I am an few years experienced developer in multiple platforms and programming languages. I am also experienced in web technologies such as C\# .NET , JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, PHP, SQL, SEO, Content management system development, responsive web development, Restful web service and Webforms; And  am also experienced in Java based web services and applications development, native Android mobile application or cross-platform mobile web application; And   Recently, I am implementing some projects with ASP.NET MVC and Angular JS as well.  Therefore I know how to use such tools very well, Visual Studio, SQL server, Maven, Eclipse, Tomcat, Jira, Confluence, Scrum methodology, Photoshop, Git, TortoiseSVN, FileZilla, Apache Cordova, and so on. 

### Work Experience
Web developer - Full Time  06.2014 -04.2015 Spire Web & Design AS
1.Content management system development.
2.Front-end development including desktop version and mobile version.
3.MSSQL development

%------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
\begin{rSubsection}{Mobile Application Developer - Part Time}{October. 2012 - May.2014}{Norwegian Information Security Lab / Norwegian Biometrics Lab}{ }
\item Remote identity authentication system with fingerprint by using Google Cloud Messaging service (Android-platform).
\item Mobile phone camera based fingerprint recognition program development. (Android platform) 
\item Cross-platform mobile application to collect the air quality and people's feelings about the air, cooperating with Norsk institutt for luftforskning.
\end{rSubsection}

%--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

\begin{rSubsection}{.NET Developer - Internship}{April 2012 - June 2012}{Headsense Technology Company}{}
\item Police station management system development.
\end{rSubsection}

%------------------------------------------------

\begin{rSubsection}{Trainee}{February 2012 - March 2012}{QST Green Soft Training Company}{}
\item C\#.NET training
\end{rSubsection}

### Rather Drive Stick?
If you prefer to not use the automatic generator, push a branch named `gh-pages` to your repository to create a page manually. In addition to supporting regular HTML content, GitHub Pages support Jekyll, a simple, blog aware static site generator written by our own Tom Preston-Werner. Jekyll makes it easy to create site-wide headers and footers without having to copy them across every page. It also offers intelligent blog support and other advanced templating features.

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor's GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at https://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
